Brief overview of the role
Urgent vacancy! Apprentice Administrator required for KarePlus which delivery care within clients homes across Birmingham. This is an excellent opportunity to earn, learn and gain a nationally recognised qualification in Business Administration Level 3.

Results.Title: Business Administrator Apprenticeship
Results.ShortDescription:
There’s no such thing as a typical day at WSP. Your role will be varied and your learning will be fast paced. One day can be completely different to the next. 
You may be involved with taking concepts, ideas and designs from an architect or engineer and creating drawings using software such as Autocad to match those given.

Results.Title: Business Administration Apprentice

Most properties will be vacant apartments and houses however some may have tenants/landlords present. You will be between properties and it is a very active and physically demanding role.
